ch.nolix.interfaces.net

Interface IEndPoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndPoint

    public interface IEndPoint
extends Stoppable
    An end point is an object that can send and receive string messages.
